alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Tooele County through 315 PM MDT... At 230 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southwest of Utah Test and Training Range South, or 25 miles southeast of Wendover, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wendover, Utah Test and Training Range South and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 0 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
